pullRequest.title: HTTP2 minor fixes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Improve timing log in Http2ClientStreamStatsHandler.
Allow Linux TCP buffer auto tune by not providing a socket buffer size.
Enhance Http2BlockingChannel.

commit.message:
HTTP2 minor fixes.

1. Improve timing log in Http2ClientStreamStatsHandler.
2. Allow Linux TCP buffer auto tune by not providing a socket buffer size.
3. Enhance Http2BlockingChannel.

nodes.bodyText: nit: Can we create a Http2BlokcingChannelConfig to encapsulate those values?
